long_description: This Yakima GetOut cargo bag is a great alternative to a hard-shell cargo box. It attaches to almost anything on top of your car and folds up for easy storage when not needed. Made of PVC-free fabric, bag features weather-resistant, sealed seams to keep contents dry and clean. Padded handle makes lifting easy, while wing spans on handles make for easier handling of heavy loads. Yakima GetOut cargo bag features lockable zippers and oversize pull tabs (locks sold separately). Fits round, square and most factory crossbars, as well as naked roofs; includes straps.
short_description: This Yakima GetOut cargo bag is a great alternative to a hard-shell cargo box. It attaches to almost anything on top of your car and folds up for easy storage when not needed.
